channel.title: Is it possible to make an RTS game using the Source engine?
channel.description: yes guys ,me and some folks are planning to create a re-make of Warcraft II ,is there any possible chance that we can use the source engine cuz it's by far one of the most realistic engines ever created

item.title: Is it possible to make an RTS game using the Source engine?
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
BaTz281:

Who is your signature of? It bugs me every time I see it cuz I recognize the face and have no idea who it is lol.

Back on topic, I haven’t played any of the RTS mods based on Source, but I wouldn’t say it’s impossible. Minus the copyright infringement, anyway.

Gina Carano, she’s an MMA figter and she played Natasha in Red Alert 3.

item.source: Is it possible to make an RTS game using the Source engine?

item.title: Is it possible to make an RTS game using the Source engine?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
It is certainly possible, you just need some custom code for units, clicking, and the view. Look at NS, it was a mod for HL1, and it pulled it off well (the RTS part, I mean. Pulled off everything well.)
It is also possible to do an FPS RPG, and that’s something I’d like to see on source someday.
(Not a huge world in a single map, but the RPG would work!)

Read full topic
